p: The overall SI distribution of COVID-19 in the Marche region was computed in Figure 5 A. Using the SI value mentioned above, we estimated the maximum likelihood (ML) of reproduction value was 1.852 (0.6–2.3) with 95% of CI on virus outbreak in early phases ( Figure 5B). The distribution of R values histogram plot with the bootstrap technique can be observed in Figure 5C. Besides, we also computed the reproduction values of individual provinces based on case incidences by maintaining similar SI. The ML of R median value for Pesaro and Urbano, Ancona, Fermo, Ascoli Piceno, and Macerata was achieved 2.492 (1.1–4.5), 2.162 (1.0–4.0), 1.512 (0.75–2.75), 1.141 (1.0–1.6), and 1.792 (1.0–3.5) with 95% of CI respectively ( Figure 6 A–E).
